at.tugraz.kmi.medokyservice.bl

Class RecommendationManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • at.tugraz.kmi.medokyservice.bl.RecommendationManager

  • public class RecommendationManager
extends java.lang.Object
    The class manages the registration and instantiation of classes derived from Intervention. Recommendations are broadly classified into three groups: learning resources, learning activities, learning peers.
    Author:
    Simone Kopeinik
